participant_1.background:
I watch documentaries about aliens to remind myself that there is more to life than what we can see.
i am a casual dresser.
i live in a house in california.
i decided to become vegan a year ago.
My forgetfulness can be a nuisance to my running mates.

participant_2.background:
I recently got to share my love of sports with a larger audience.
I love to watch romantic comedies with my family because they make us laugh and feel good.
I wouldn't be able to be a Christmas tree decorator if I were blind.
I do not own a home, but I do enjoy traveling and sharing my experiences with the world.
i read tons of books.

content.text: Hey! What's up?
Not much! Just finished reading a book.
Oh cool, what was it about?
It was about a group of friends who go on a road trip.
Sounds fun! What did you think of it?
It was really good! I had a lot of fun reading it.
That's awesome! I'm glad you enjoyed it.
Me too! I'm always looking for new books to read.
Me too! I love reading.
Do you have any favorite genres?
I like a lot of different genres, but I'm really into science fiction and fantasy right now.
Oh cool! I like those genres too.
What's your favorite book?
That's a tough question. I have a lot of favorites.
Me too! I love having conversations about books.
Me too! It's always fun to talk about books with people who love to read.
I agree! It's so nice to meet someone who gets it.
Me too! I feel like I'm always talking to people who don't really care about books.
Same here! It's so refreshing to meet someone who is just as passionate about reading as I am.
Me too! I'm glad we met.
Me too! Let's talk about books again soon!
Sounds good
